#

#... omega(Longitude of ascending node [deg] linedOmg(Longitude of perihelion[deg]) l(Mean Longitude[deg])
#orbital period
#show planet on startup (1-yes;0-no)
#color of orbit line (in matlab RGB)
#style of orbit line (- or -- or : or -.)
